name: Mixed Dorm Bed#1@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

Get down to the Italian, Greek, French and Chinese restaurants and have a drink.

I appreciate the random, the spontaneous, and the unexpected beauty and fun in the places and people I visit.

name: Lamma Island Yung Shue Wan Studio
description: Eagle's Nest
neighborhood_overview:
The location is rural with a valley and sea view. island with no vehicle, 岛上没有载人的车。

You will awake to the sound of birds singing in the trees. 清晨醒来，听到的是风声和树上鸟的叫声。

The aprtment is a 7to10minute walk from the main village with shops, pubs
and restaurants. 从公寓走路到码头约7至10分钟。

There is easy access to walking trails and beaches.要去沙滩也很容易。

There are vegetable shops. 买菜做饭去大街买就行了，从公寓走到大街约10分钟。
host_about:
We are a couple from Hong Kong.  I am English, my wife is Chinese. As a teacher, with good holidays, we use airbnb as a great website to find accommodation. Enjoying travel, we fully understand the needs of guests. Our apartments reflect our taste and life style, and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

大家好! 我叫Ming, 是土生土长的厦门人,  但已经在香港生活28年了｡因为先生Peter在国际学校当老师, 所以我们有很多假期｡每逢假期, 我们都会出外旅行｡在安排旅程中, 首选的是airbnb (爱彼迎)｡ 正因为我们也是旅行者, 身知旅行者所需｡从我们在香港南丫岛,三明永安, 英国利兹和澳洲珀斯的家,你们可以感受到我们对生活的热爱与追求｡
对我们来说,偏爱去有大海,阳光,沙滩,美食和没有空气污染的国家｡去过的国家当中,较喜欢法国巴黎,特别是法国南部城市,希腊岛屿,克罗地亚,伦敦,普吉岛､巴厘岛和长滩岛｡
请加微+信minky69

name: 21%off Free WiFi “1” Studio near Subway
description:
Welcome to our cozy & charming studio apartment in the vibrant neighborhood of Sai Ying Pun, Hong Kong! This is the perfect choice for solo travelers or couples.

One block away from the Sai Ying Pun MTR Station. In a 3 minutes, you can easily access the Tram and Buses. The Macau Ferry Terminal, Airport Express HK Station, and International Finance Centre are also within close proximity. Easy access to SoHo & Lan Kwai Fong (LKF).

Convenience is key, and you'll find supermarkets, laundries.
neighborhood_overview:
Sai Ying Pun is an area in Western District, in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, in Hong Kong. It is administratively part of Central and Western District.

In Chinese language (Cantonese dialect regarding the spoken version), Sai (西) means "west" and Ying Pun (營盤) means "camp", especially military camp. It was where the early British military (website hidden) Ying Pun is built on the steeply sloping lower slopes of Victoria Peak and also on the western reclamation. The areas of Shek Tong Tsui and Kennedy Town are located to the west, Sheung Wan and Tai Ping Shan are to the east, and Midlevels is higher on the hill to the south. Victoria Harbour is to the north.
host_about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

Furnished with queen size bed (150cm x 190.50cm), split unit air-con, cable TV, safe deposit box, dry kitchen with microwave, electric water kettle, basic utensil & hair dryer is available. Free WIFI.
neighborhood_overview:
Our place is very convenient where you can reach our studio in 25 mins from airport by airport bus A22 (HK$39). This bus is operated in 15 mins interval.

Nearby shopping mall/night market: ICC/The Element shopping mall, Harbour City shopping, Temple street (the night market), Kowloon Park, etc.

Location feature:
Jordan is located at Kowloon city centre and is a vibrant area where we are:
- 2 mins walk to Temple street night market
- 2 mins walk to Austin Station(West Railway Line)
- 5 mins walk to Jordan MTR Station
- 10mins walk to Tsim Sha Tsui (TST)
- 15 mins walk to China Ferries Terminal (Ferries to Macau and China)

There are convenient stores, supermarket nearby our place. Apart from that, many variaties of restaurants serving different type of cuisine like Sichuan, Japanese, Korean, local cantonese food can be find nearby the area.

From the airport, take the A22 (HK $39) airport bus which will take

host_about:
As a Superhost on Airbnb since 2014, I’m passionate about creating memorable experiences for my guests. My love of travel has taken me to 30+ countries, where I’ve had the opportunity to explore new cultures and meet amazing people. Look forward to meeting you, my new friend!

Hi，我是Selena來自HK！旅行、美食、電影、音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴。每到一座陌生的城市，走街串巷，逛逛當地的菜市場，鉆鉆當地的小巷子，吃吃路邊攤，逛逛自由市場，才能真正體驗當地人的生活，不虛此行！另外，去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩，會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫。我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友。Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會。我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的。當然啦，Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店，成長路上難免有不足之處，望多一份溝通少一份誤解，Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨！

description:
🔸 Share Dormitory room
- Lower bed in spacious room
- Individual curtain for privacy
- Reading light & locker
- Air-conditioning
- Hygienic share bathroom & toilet
- Hair dryer & essential toiletries

🔸 Bright & Spacious Communal Space
- Fill with plants to make you feel rejuvenated

- FREE distilled drinking water, coffee & tea
+ WiFi (Fibre Optic speed ) for whole area!
host_about:
Located in TST nestled around 5-star hotels, HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed with independent travelers from around the world in mind. Whether you are travelling with only one backpack or lugging along a couple of suitcases, we are pleased to offer you a comfy, modern, and clean, yet affordable, living space while offering friendly and helpful service. 

Tripadvisor CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2013 /2015 /  2016
Tripadvisor's TRAVELER'S CHOICE 2013 WINNER - TOP 20 BUDGET HOTEL
Tripadvisor's TRAVELER'S CHOICE 2012 WINNER - TRENDIEST HOTEL
Tripadvisor CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2012
Voted the No.1 HONG KONG HOSTEL 2010 & 2010 by Hostelworld

Personally, I have some pretty good availability, I hope to provide more passenger Airbnb, and also hope that everyone stay with us here are very pleasant and comfortable. Of course, Selena's hotel is to make friends from all over the world for the purpose of affordable hotel, we have been trying to do better, but we still have shortcomings, I hope every guest a little more of a communication misunderstanding, Selena is looking forward to you and your friends!///


Hi，我是Selena來自HK！旅行、美食、電影、音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴。每到一座陌生的城市，走街串巷，逛逛當地的菜市場，鉆鉆當地的小巷子，吃吃路邊攤，逛逛自由市場，才能真正體驗當地人的生活，不虛此行！另外，去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩，會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫。我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友。Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會。我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的。當然啦，Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店，成長路上難免有不足之處，望多一份溝通少一份誤解，Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨！

name: Cosy room in Sai Ying Pun heart of HK Female Only
description:
It is a quiet single bedroom with a bed, a drawer, a wardrobe and a foldable desk, high floor, modern contemporary decor with lots of natural lights and a touch with quality accessories.
The building itself located just 2 mins walk from Sai Ying Pun Station, 1-2 mins walk to supermarkets, cafes, 5-10 mins walk to HK Macau Ferry Terminal, 5 mins subway ride or 15 mins walk to central. Prime location, very easy access to all attractions, restaurants, bars and parks all over Hong Kong.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in between Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan, just 2 subway stops away from the luxury yet busy Financial District of HK, the neighbourhood is funky, lively , trendy, yet down to earth, easy to fit in. Known as "French quarter" or "small Brooklyn" of HK,it becomes a new hipster central, attracts to lots of young expats and local professionals who is working hard and play harder:)

The neighborhood is home to lots of brilliant cafés and coffee shops, fantastic local and international cuisine, antique shops , art galleries and boutique designers shops, the famous antique street and trendy PMQ just 10-15 mins walk from my place. Locals, expats, tourists, businessmen, artists, you can ran into a lot of different people here, very interesting and tourists friendly.

Parks: Sun Yat Sen Memorial Park just 5 mins walk, it offers a standard public swimming pool, morning jogging trail along the harbour , soccer field and 2 basketballs courts. Perfect for a morning walk

name: Female Dorm Bed#2@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

description: A room with 2 single beds and a private bathroom. Licensed since 2006. 3 min walk away from the Yaumatei MTR Station C Exit (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps). Each room has its own bathroom and air conditioning. Free Wifi. Discount for long-term stay.
neighborhood_overview:
EXCELLENT LOCATION
We are in the heart of city center (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps)!

On Nathan Road
- 3 mins walk to Yaumatei MTR
# 2 stations to Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon
# 3 stations to Central, Financial District / to the Peak / to Lan Kwai Fong

- 5 mins by taxi to Hung Hom Railway Station to get TRAIN to CHINA
- 5 mins by taxi to China Hong Kong City to get FERRY to MACAU
- 5 mins by taxi to Kowloon Station to get AIRPORT EXPRESS TRAIN to HK AIRPORT and
- also to the tallest building in HK, ICC International Commerce Centre, and get to SKY100, a 360-degree indoor observation deck, to have a stunning view of Hong Kong from day & night!

From airport

- 45 mins by airport shuttle bus A21, dropping off at the 9th stop “Man Ming Lane station / Kowloon post office”

To airport

host_about:
香港自由行宾馆座落在香港九龙弥敦道440-442号泽丰大厦12楼,是经香港政府批准登记合法的宾馆(牌照:H/3751)｡宾馆有房间10余个,每个客房都有明窗,卫生间｡空调､彩电､电话等设备一应俱全｡宾馆配有宽带,并可无线上网｡该宾馆位处弥敦道最中心繁华地段,价格合理,安全卫生,交通便利,旺角､尖沙咀商业､购物中心近在咫尺｡是工薪阶层商务､旅游､购物的理想住处｡我們離高鐡站只要步行十分鐘. 請用導航系統來我們賓館. 长期住客享有折扣优惠｡

Welcome to Hong Kong! Since 2006, I operate a licensed hostel at 12/F, 440-442 Nathan Road (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps). The location is 3 minutes away from the Yaumatei MTR Station C Exit, providing easy access to the airport, restaurants, shopping centers and tourist attractions. Every room has its own bathroom, air conditioning, TV and telephone. Free Wifi is also available. Discount is offered for weekly or monthly stay.

*I'm not good at communicating in English. I apologize in advance if your inquiries are not responded in a timely manner.

We are in the heart of city center (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps)!

On Nathan Road
- 3 mins walk to Yaumatei MTR
# 2 stations to Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon
# 3 stations to Central, Financial District / to the Peak / to Lan Kwai Fong
- 2 mins walk to famous night market, Temple Street
- 5 mins by taxi to Hung Hom Railway Station to get TRAIN to CHINA
- 5 mins by taxi to China Hong Kong City to get FERRY to MACAU
- 5 mins by taxi to Kowloon Station to get AIRPORT EXPRESS TRAIN to HK AIRPORT and
- also to the tallest building in HK, ICC International Commerce Centre, and get to SKY100, a 360-degree indoor observation deck, to have a stunning view of Hong Kong from day & night!

From airport
- 30 mins by taxi (HK$ 220 to HK$240)
- 45 mins by airport shuttle bus A21, dropping off at the 9th stop “Man Ming Lane station / Kowloon post office”

To airport
- only a few steps and
host_about:
香港自由行宾馆座落在香港九龙弥敦道440-442号泽丰大厦12楼,是经香港政府批准登记合法的宾馆(牌照:H/3751)｡宾馆有房间10余个,每个客房都有明窗,卫生间｡空调､彩电､电话等设备一应俱全｡宾馆配有宽带,并可无线上网｡该宾馆位处弥敦道最中心繁华地段,价格合理,安全卫生,交通便利,旺角､尖沙咀商业､购物中心近在咫尺｡是工薪阶层商务､旅游､购物的理想住处｡我們離高鐡站只要步行十分鐘. 請用導航系統來我們賓館. 长期住客享有折扣优惠｡

description:
- 2 electric sockets, locker, bed curtain & reading light
- Free Fibre Optic high speed Wifi

host_about:
Located in TST nestled around 5-star hotels, HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed with independent travelers from around the world in mind. Whether you are travelling with only one backpack or lugging along a couple of suitcases, we are pleased to offer you a comfy, modern, and clean, yet affordable, living space while offering friendly and helpful service.

name: B1-MTR站旁/旺角站/大床房有窗/有獨立衛浴 Kammun Guest House
description:
The hotel is a licensed hotel in Hong Kong and opened in 1987.

All standard and triple rooms have windows, WiFi and a private bathroom.

The hotel is located in the center of Mong Kok in Kowloon, Hong Kong, close to the airport bus, China-Hong Kong direct train, train and subway, easy to get around.Surrounded by shopping and tourist hotspots such as Langham Palace, Letter and Center, Women Street, Mongkok Computer Center, etc.Free wifi, TV, towels, toiletries, hair dryer, adapter, private bathroom, microwave and refrigerator in the lobby, balcony and public area.
neighborhood_overview: The hotel is located in the center of Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong. It is close to Xiyangcai Street (Electrical Appliances Street), Tongcai Street (Women's Street) and Laundry Street (Ball Street) in Mongkok. It is about 150 meters from Mongkok Metro Station and A21 Airport Bus. Other shopping and tourism hotspots, such as Langham Place, Xinhe Center, Mongkok Computer Center, Temple Street, etc. can also be reached within 5-15 minutes on foot.Go to Xingguang Avenue, Harbour City, Hongqiao Gymnasium, China-Hong Kong Pier, Hong Kong-Macao Pier, etc. There are also direct metro or buses.There are hundreds of shops and restaurants around the hotel, including Salsa, Excellence, Zhou Dafu, Zhou Shengsheng, Fengze, Broadway, Currency Exchange, Qihua Cake House, Shao Xiangyuan, Ji Cake House, Fat Sister Snacks and so on.Many restaurants are open 24 hours.

name: T1-Triple Room with private bathroom MongKok MTR
description: We are licensed guest house, opened in 1987. All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days.
neighborhood_overview:
Tourist spot in/around Mong Kok:

* Sai Yeung Choi Street ( concentrates shops of electronic products, cosmetics, and discount books. )

* Tung Choi Street (also known as 女人街, Ladies' market,specializes in women's clothing, accessories, and cosmetics, and is open daily from noon to midnight. There are also food stalls selling noodles, seafood, and congee. An open-air market of fruits and vegetables is also located in the vicinity)

* Sai Yee Street (with many sport shops)

* Goldfish Street (There are a dozens of shops and hawkers selling tropical freshwater and marine fish, aquarium and accessories)

* Flower Market

* Langham Place (59-storey complex with a shopping mall, a hotel, and offices.)

* Sino Centre (Shops sell comic books, VCDs and DVDs related to Japanese cartoons, and regular CD albums)

* Temple Street (night market and one of the busiest flea markets at night in the territory)

name: Female Dorm Bed#1@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: B7-旺角MTR站旁 大床房有窗/獨立衛浴/金門賓館
description:
The hotel is a licensed hotel in Hong Kong and opened in 1987.All standard and triple rooms have windows, WiFi and a private bathroom.
The hotel is located in the center of Mong Kok in Kowloon, Hong Kong, close to the airport bus, China-Hong Kong direct train, train and subway, easy to get around.Surrounded by shopping and tourist hotspots such as Langham Palace, Letter and Center, Women Street, Mongkok Computer Center, etc.

Free wifi, TV, towels, toiletries, hair dryer, adapter, private bathroom, microwave and refrigerator in the lobby, balcony and public area.
neighborhood_overview:
The hotel is located in the center of Mong Kok in Kowloon, Hong Kong. It is close to Mong Kok Western Cuisine Street (Electrical Street), Thonglor Cuisine Street (Women's Street) and Laundry Street (Bow Ball Street). It is about 150 meters from Mong Kok Subway Station and the A21 Airport Bus. Other shopping and tourist hotspots such as Langhawang, Xinhe Center, Mong Kok Computer Center, Temple Street, etc. can also be reached by walking directly within 5-15 minutes.There are also direct subways or buses to Starlight Avenue, Harbor City, Hong Kong Gymnasium, China Harbor Pier, Hong Kong and Macau Piers, etc.

The hotel is surrounded by hundreds of shops and restaurants, including Salsa, Excellence, Zhou Dafu, Zhou Sheng, Fengze, Broadway, money changer, Chihuahua, Shao Xiangyuan, Jingji Pie Family, Fat Sister Snacks, etc. Restaurants are open 24 hours.

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#D@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

We are a family-run guesthouse with native English, Chinese, and Tagalog speakers. We live on the same floor and monitor the guesthouse with security surveillance cameras. Each room has a lock, entrance to the reception requires a keycard, and entrance to the building after 11pm requires a key.

amenities: ["Wifi", "Elevator", "Hangers", "Fire extinguisher", "Smoke alarm", "Hair dryer", "Air conditioning", "TV"]

name: 2BR Inner City Villa with MTR access around corner
description:
With mass transit around the corner, my apartment is located 5 mins away from the heart of Mongkok shopping hub. Immediately downstairs, there is also a bus station to most places in Guangdong province. My upgraded apartment is situated on the 2nd floor of the building so you have to use the staircase for two storeys.

Leave Mongkok Core Shopping Area in 5 points.My turn is the Yau Ma Tei subway exit.There is also a Yongdong bus stop on the opposite road, which can directly reach most parts of Guangdong.It's easy to come. My house has been renovated for more than a year, but the floor is on the second floor of the building, so it takes two stairs.
The turn-by-turn subway will take you to about 4 stops to Wanchai Exhibition Center, or 8-10 stops to Disney or Asia Show.
neighborhood_overview: From my place,it is at most 10 minute walk to most mega shopping malls and flee markets including Lady street,Sneaker Street,Temple Street and Multiple Shopping malls in Mongkok.
host_about:
Love to travel for pleasure and explore great food , meeting interesting people and getting to know their culture. Having traveled around the US and Europe for business, I come to appreciate what a traveler would like during their stay. 

Im new to this but i can assure you, I will try my best to give you a great stay.

description: A family size will definitely appreciate this home in the city center, it is easy to go anywhere, this is a triple room with windows, private toilet, one is a 1.2m wide bed and a 75cm wide bed, a family size will definitely appreciate this home in the city center, it is easy to go anywhere, downstairs Tsim Sha Tsui subway C2 entrance and A21 airport bus station, behind the hotel is the music road, many local restaurants, from the hotel to Victoria Harbour only 7 minutes walk, and walk to Tsim Sha Tsui Canton Road Harbour City is also only 6 minutes, downstairs surrounded by SASA, supermarket, bank, pharmacy, is a very ideal location, the host has a Hong Kong tourist card, can provide Travel arrangements for passengers during the port period.
host_about: 我是個普通香港人，本人很喜歡去旅遊，特別了解旅客的需要，所以前幾年考到香港的導遊證和領隊證，對於香港各方面都比較熟悉，而且這兩年開了屬於自己的旅館（喜日酒店），希望讓你們每個客人開開心心來玩，滿滿意意回家，嘿嘿。

description: All our rooms have a separate toilet. Clean and comfortable accommodation is the selling point of our rooms! Such as salsa, Bonjour, Fortress, Broadway, Chow Sang Sang, Chow Tai Fook, Milan Station (specialized in selling major brand-name handbags), just 120 meters away from the biggest shopping mall in Mong Kok Langham Place. host_about:
Hi, everyone.
I'm Jean
Although I had just come airbnb soon. But our listings had already been sold on major websites.
A warm and cozy room allows you to slow down in the hustle and bustle of the city. Enjoy your own city space.
Located in the famous Nathan Road, which is one of the most prosperous areas in Hong Kong, the trend of fashion. Traditional culture. Market style. Snack food are gathered here, the region is crowded, many shops shop overnight business, so Is known as the "no night" of Kowloon.
... welcome you to book our room, we would like to do our best to your journey to bring the greatest convenience!


各位小夥伴們.大家好.
我是Jean.
雖然我剛來airbnb不久.但我們的房源此前已有在各大網站售賣.
精緻典雅.溫馨裝潢.乾淨舒適的房間讓您在喧囂的城市中放慢腳步.恣意享受屬於自己的城市空間.
位於著名的弥敦道贯穿其中,这里是香港人气最旺盛的地区之一,潮流时尚.传统文化.市井风貌.小吃美食都汇集于此,全区繁华拥挤,不少商铺食肆通宵营业,故被称为是九龙的“不夜天”.
......歡迎您預訂我們的房間,愿我們能盡綿薄之力給您的旅途帶來最大的方便！

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#5@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to great views, restaurants and dining, the beach, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

host_about:
我是一个普通的女人，我最喜爱的旅游地点是香港，韩国，日本，喜欢看些时装和旅游方面的杂志，电影我还是比较喜欢看港片，电视一般看娱乐节目比较多，喜欢怀旧音乐，也喜欢全世界的美食，个人旅游首先选择购物方便，又有美食的国家和地区，非常讲究注意食物和环境安全与卫生
I am an ordinary woman, my favorite tourist destination is Hong Kong, South Korea, Japan, like watching some fashion and travel magazines and movies I prefer to see Hong Kong films and television entertainment more, like nostalgic music, also like the beauty of the world food, personal travel, shopping convenience, and cuisine of countries and regions, very particular about the pay attention to food and environmental safety and health

name: 30 min ferry ride takes you back in time 50 years
description:
Peng Chau's hidden oasis is Hong Kong's most connected outlying island.
Perfect for a staycation or a base to explore & island hop. 5 min to pier.
We are a 1 minute walk to the beach, 5 mins to the community BBQ pits. In any direction, there are hiking trails just waiting to be explored, leading through small farms and along the numerous beaches. Our flat is brilliant for couples, solo adventurers, families (with kids), and big groups (our adjacent flat sleeps an additional 4, if available).
neighborhood_overview:
Peng Chau is a small tight knit community where everyone knows everyone else. Peng Chau is the ideal island to get away from it all and do a little hiking and exploring. There is more to Peng Chau then long walks on the beach, you can book a pottery making class or discovery our many restaurants.
wikipedia Peng Chau
neighbourhood: Peng Chau, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: Our flat is 5 mins to the pier, 1 min to the beach
description: A cozy little ground floor flat in the heart of Peng Chau. Our flat is well equipped for a weekend staycation or for the tourist who wants to see a different Hong Kong. We are close to walking paths, the beaches and restaurants (actually everything is close in Peng Chau). The newly renovated flat has an adjacent flat that can be rent together for large parties up to 8.We are a 30 minute ferry from Central. An 8 minute ferry from Discovery Bay & a 20 minute from Mui Wo, South Lantau.
neighborhood_overview:
Peng Chau is a small tight knit community where everyone knows everyone else. Peng Chau is the ideal island to get away from it all and do a little hiking and exploring. There is more to Peng Chau then long walks on the beach, you can book a pottery making class or discovery our many restaurants.

description:
There are no other guests at this property

- Come and drop off your luggage at 9:00 am and leave until 11:00 pm when you leave
- 12 mins walk to China Passenger Pier to Macau and Zhuhai
- 1 minute walk to West Kowloon, Austin subway station Exit A
- Free portable mobile WiFi (unlimited from 1010 5G program)
- Airbnb Certified High Speed WiFi - 652 Mbps


Convenient transportation:
1 min walk to A22 Chengba Airport Express Station (Austin Road Jordan Road)
3 mins walk to Guangdong Road Hong Kong Pearl Macao Bridge Bus Station
10 mins walk to Kowloon station airport link
10min walk to Jordan MRT
5 min walk to Nishi-Kowloon station bus terminal: to and from different places in Hong Kong
Walk 10 minutes to Yuanfang Mall: Shenzhen Bay, Hong Kong Pearl Macao Bridge, Jiangmen, Zhongshan, Foshan and other places.

Perfectly located in a prime location:
10 mins walk to Tsim Sha Tsui Harbor City, Round Sq
host_about:
威信号：-garyps

我是一位土生土长的香港人，能说流利的普通话、英文和广东话。￼

对于这座城市，我有着非常深入的了解。如果您對香港的文化、美食或旅游景点有任何疑问，都可以随时向我咨询。

作为一名音乐表演和后期制作从，我对音乐有着深厚的兴趣尤其是Funk Rock、 Jazz Fusion等。另外，我喜欢各种类型的运动：单车、健身、游泳和篮球。

旅途中最重要的不仅仅是景点的游览，更是真正了解当地人文、风土人情以及地道生活。作为一个民宿房东，我希望帮助客人更好地了解香港的饮食、文化、艺术等方面。

name: Bright Central 1bedroom above the Soho escalator
description:
Smart and cosy 1bedroom apartment located in the heart of Central above the escalators, close to local wet market, vibrant Soho's night life, and Lan Kwai Fung. All walking distance.
6min walk to the Central MTR.
Peaceful ambiance at night.
Ideal if you come for one professional week or one touristic tour in the city.
Lots of day light through the windows and open view on the city skyline. Functional,pleasant lay out and decoration to feel at home, relax after enjoying the HK buzz.
host_about: film maker living in HK, 23  welcoming of musicians

name: Wireless WIFI. Available 2. Neat double bed room
description: All our rooms have a separate toilet. Clean and comfortable accommodation is the selling point of our rooms! The hotel is located on Nathan Road in the heart of Mong Kok, with convenient transportation. It is only 100 meters away from Mong Kok MTR Station Exit E1, and 5 seconds walk downstairs to the airport A21 bus stop. Langham Place, Mong Kok's largest shopping mall, is just 100 metres away, with more than hundreds of snack bars, restaurants and shops nearby.
neighborhood_overview: Our guesthouse downstairs is the golden shrine shopping - Nathan Road, Mong Kok Electric Street near there (Sai Yeung Choi Street), famous Ladies Market (Tung Choi Street), Sneaker Street (Yee Street) etc. 5-minute walk to a radius there are various districts throughout Hong Kong bus stations, airports A21 bus stop (just walk downstairs in the hotel that is to 5 seconds), and more than hundreds of grocery stores, currency exchange shop. Such as salsa, Bonjour, Fortress, Broadway, Chow Sang Sang, Chow Tai Fook, Milan Station (specialized in selling major brand-name handbags), just 120 meters away from the biggest shopping mall in Mong Kok Langham Place. Select multiple nearby restaurants, Tao Heung. Tai Hing. Greenwood. Hong Kong Style Tea Restaurant, Thai. Global buffet, international cuisine everything, 24 hours is not closing gourmet food stores everywhere. From the Avenue of Stars in Tsim Sha Tsui, Harbour City, only 7 minute subway ride to the Hong Kong Coliseum concert will also d
host_about:
Hi, everyone.
I'm Jean
Although I had just come airbnb soon. But our listings had already been sold on major websites.
A warm and cozy room allows you to slow down in the hustle and bustle of the city. Enjoy your own city space.
Located in the famous Nathan Road, which is one of the most prosperous areas in Hong Kong, the trend of fashion. Traditional culture. Market style. Snack food are gathered here, the region is crowded, many shops shop overnight business, so Is known as the "no night" of Kowloon.
... welcome you to book our room, we would like to do our best to your journey to bring the greatest convenience!


各位小夥伴們.大家好.
我是Jean.
雖然我剛來airbnb不久.但我們的房源此前已有在各大網站售賣.
精緻典雅.溫馨裝潢.乾淨舒適的房間讓您在喧囂的城市中放慢腳步.恣意享受屬於自己的城市空間.
位於著名的弥敦道贯穿其中,这里是香港人气最旺盛的地区之一,潮流时尚.传统文化.市井风貌.小吃美食都汇集于此,全区繁华拥挤,不少商铺食肆通宵营业,故被称为是九龙的“不夜天”.
......歡迎您預訂我們的房間,愿我們能盡綿薄之力給您的旅途帶來最大的方便！

name: Second room for rent with terrace in cozy apt
description:
Renting out second room . This is in a 2 bedrooms apartment, the host is living in one room. Guest will be sharing bathroom and kitchen with the host.

Located at the nice hip area of Hong Kong . There are coffee shops and bars.
We are 5 min away from B2 exit of Sai Ying Pun station, 2 station away from the heart of Hong Kong - Central.

One street above (high street) has lots of wine and dine place. Right down the house , there are restaurants in the alley where the apartment is located.
neighborhood_overview: Moderately busy in the morning, quiet at night

name: 30% OFF! CC Tsim Sha Tsui Metro 2 pax with Toilet
description:
Welcome to my listing!

• High speed WIFI
• Free luggage storage
. Please do note that only one complimentary bottle of water will be provided per booking. A kettle will be available in the room.
. 1 min walk from the Tsim Sha Tsui metro and Airport A21 bus ( in front of our building door)
• The building has 3 elevators and 24-hour security guard.
• Few mins walk to Victoria Harbor, Canton Road, Avenue of Stars n etc.

Hope my listing will bring you a good and comfort stay!
neighborhood_overview:
Located at the heart of Tim Sha Tsui area, 1 mins walk to the Tim Sha Tsui MTR station, and 5 mins walk to the Victoria Harbour.

Located in the heart of the Tsim Sha Tsui area, 1 minute walk to Tsim Sha Tsui MRT Station and 5 minutes walk to Victoria Harbour.
host_about:
Hey, 

I am an outgoing person who like to meet new friends. I have been traveling and working in more than 40 countries. I am a friendly host.  That's why I will treat you like my guest not customer. Besides, I love Painting. Hope I can meet someone like painting so we can exchange ideas and pass it on to others. I also like people traveling to my country. By this, we can both sharing culture and fun in different ways. I wish you all have a happy journey in Hong Kong. My family and I are managing all my listings, and I need to travel sometimes, if anything you wanna know just ask don't be shy! Bon voyage!

name: A1.Tsim Sha Tsui station, private bathroom, WIFI
description:
Our room holds a formal license issued by the Hong Kong Government.
The rooms are fully equipped with air conditioning, TV, telephone, wireless internet, separate bathroom and Disposable toiletries, slippers.24-hour security surveillance lens and hot and cold water all-weather supply,Every day there are people who clean the room, to provide guests with safe, health, affordable and comfortable environment.
neighborhood_overview: Our hotel is located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong - Nathan Road, about 1 minute walk to the MTR, the airport bus A21 can be reached (URL HIDDEN), Bonjour, Luk Fook, Chow Sang Sang, Chow Tai Fook is located nearby, and several banks can provide you with currency exchange.Nearby snacks are also very convenient,HuiLauShan,Tsui Wah Restaurant,Jenny Bakery,the tea restaurant and so on.Near star avenue, Victoria, harbour city,hung hom stadium.
host_about:
作為旅人.
有時候只是需要一個如同家一般簡單的私人空間.
累了.
就請停下你的腳步.
好好休息.再出發!

經營家庭式旅館數十年的我們擁有不少價格實惠并乾淨舒適的房間.
歡迎更多的旅客朋友們前來入住!
很樂意為您來介紹這一不夜城-東方之珠-香港.

As a traveler.
Sometimes it just needs a simple private space like a home.
tired.
Please stop your footsteps.
Have a good rest.

We have a lot of affordable and clean and comfortable rooms for many years.
Welcome more travelers to come to stay!
I am happy to introduce you to this Evergreen City - Pearl of the Orient - Hong Kong.

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#7@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

name: (佐敦)小清新主題大床房 ~ 地理交通優先選(步行2分鐘到地鐵站, 8分鐘到尖沙咀)
description: We are a 16-room licensed inn in the heart of Kowloon with convenient transportation (2 mins walk to the MTR station, 5 mins to/from the airport bus station, 8 mins to Tsim Sha Tsui) We are located in Jordan - a very popular place for travelers and Hong Kong citizens where you can find the most unique and traditional culture of Hong Kong.Endless local food and entertainment are just a few dozen steps away.Before dark, the streets were filled with stalls and nightclubs, forming a beautiful picture of the bustling city of Hong Kong, with a different flavor. Music is the theme of the inn. We believe that music is a universal language and that wherever you come from, whether you're a great performer or a hidden master of bathroom singing, you'll fall in love with this place. Come and feel our rooms designed by designers, each room is different style, suitable for couples, adventurers, friends of three or five, business travellers, families (with kids), looking forward to your visit! ^ ^
host_about:
土生土長的香港人,能講廣東話、普通話、英文。 
我很樂意與遊客分享介紹香港各景點和餐廳,歡迎各地房客詢問啊。
希望有機會見到你們=)

Native Cantonese Speaker as I am a HongKonger , also speak in Mandarin and English.
I'am pleased to share you about some travel tips in HK and giving you some  recommendation for visit and something local to try!
Looking forward to meet you here! Hope to see you soon!

name: Budget Double Room for 1 to 2@旺角區大床房1-2人入住
description:

name: Executive Premier Apartment 2BR 1min TST MTR K11
description:
Welcome back my dear guests!

Welcome to the unique and ultimate 2.0 Airbnb experience!

My brand new apartment is fully renovated in a luxurious, spacious and modern style.
700sqft (66sqm) net size of pure design and comfort to make you have a wonderful time in the great city of Hong Kong.

Located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, my building has 3 direct exits to MTR. It is 1min from K11 famous shopping mall, 5min from Avenue of Stars, 8min from China Ferry Terminal.
neighborhood_overview:
I love my district as it is in the heart of TSIM SHA TSUI.
There are 3 MTR (subway) exits around my building, literally less than 1min walk.
It is the most convenient as it is on Nathan Road, the famous and large street full of malls, fancy shops qnd tasty restaurants.
- you can easily go to shopping malls such as K11 (2min walk) or The One (5min walk).
- the Avenue of Stars is 7min walk.
- many restaurants and street food all around!
- KNUTSFORD TERRACE is just 5min by walk! Here you can enjoy many bars, exotic restaurants, clubs, pools..

I hope you will enjoy as much as I do!
host_about:
Hi everybody!

I am Lyna from Hong Kong. I am an architect and I spent the last few month renovating my apartment in a luxurious and comfortable way. I am sure you will love staying there!

Airbnb is a great way to meet people from all over the world, and it allows me to rent my spacious apartment when I am travelling.

Travelling is my hobby, so most of the time I'm out of town.
Hong Kong city is amazing, beautiful and full of energy, there is always plenty of things to do.

I hope you will like it!

- Located on Nathan Road, the neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kong’s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware.

neighborhood_overview:
Mong Kok is located in the northern part of the Kowloon peninsula, and the famous Nathan Road runs through it. It is one of the most popular areas in Hong Kong. It is a place where fashion, traditional culture, market style and snacks and cuisine converge. The district is bustling and crowded, and many shops and restaurants are open all night, so it is known as the "all-night sky" of Kowloon.
Shopping Guide
Mong Kok may not have the big international brand stores like Tsim Sha Tsui, but it is a shopping destination for teenagers and young people.Shopping venues here have their own characteristics. The Langham Place, a large shopping mall, gathers a large number of trendy fashion and creative grocery stores; the girls' favorite cosmetics stores Sasa and Zhuoyue have many branches; the electronic digital stores such as Fengze, Suning, Baihui and others near Xiyang Cui South Street are one after another; the famous upstairs bookstores such as Pastoral Bookshop and Preface Studio

couples or business travellers.

Our Hotel is located at Tsim Sha Tsui, Downtown location of Hong Kong. The hotel allows you a very quick access to almost everywhere of Hong Kong.

There are many famous Korean, Japanese, Vietnamese, local Hong Kong restaurants, Convenience store and shopping mall nearby. You can enjoy your day around.
host_about:
Hi guys! This is Aqua from Hong Kong! (Big hug)
I love travelling as much as I love my life! Chatting with people from every corners of the world complete my life. I also love seeing people smiling :)
So, be my guests (or let me be your guest)!

name: Triple4.全新装修房间.三人房.适合亲子出游.旺角购物首选.交通四通八达
description: All our rooms have a separate toilet. Clean and comfortable accommodation is the selling point of our rooms! The hotel is located on Nathan Road in the heart of Mong Kok, with convenient transportation. It is only 100 meters away from Mong Kok MTR Station Exit E1, and 5 seconds walk downstairs to the airport A21 bus stop. Langham Place, Mong Kok's largest shopping mall, is just 100 metres away, with more than hundreds of snack bars, restaurants and shops nearby.
neighborhood_overview: Downstairs of our guesthouse is the golden sanctuary for shopping - Tongdun Road, close to Mong Kok Electrical Appliance Street (Western Food Street), the famous Women's Street (Thonglor Street), Bo Shoe Street (Laundry Street), etc. There are bus stops, airport A21 bus stops (just 5 seconds walk downstairs of the guesthouse), over hundreds of food stores and shops, currency exchange stores within a 5-minute walk of the guesthouse.Such as Salsa, Zhuo Sheng, Fuze, Broadway, Zhou Sheng, Zhou Dafu, Milan Station (specializing in famous branded handbags), Langham Factory, the largest mall in Mongkok is only 120 meters away.Many choices of restaurants nearby, rice aroma. Taixing. Cuihua. Cha Cha Cha, Thai.Global buffet, international cuisine, 24-hour food stores are everywhere.It is only 7 minutes by subway from Tsim Sha Tsui Avenue of Stars and Harbor City, and it is also directly accessible to the subway to go to the Hongqi Stadium to see a concert.Direct MTR access to Hong Kong Disneylan
host_about:
Hi, everyone.
I'm Jean
Although I had just come airbnb soon. But our listings had already been sold on major websites.
A warm and cozy room allows you to slow down in the hustle and bustle of the city. Enjoy your own city space.
Located in the famous Nathan Road, which is one of the most prosperous areas in Hong Kong, the trend of fashion. Traditional culture. Market style. Snack food are gathered here, the region is crowded, many shops shop overnight business, so Is known as the "no night" of Kowloon.
... welcome you to book our room, we would like to do our best to your journey to bring the greatest convenience!


各位小夥伴們.大家好.
我是Jean.
雖然我剛來airbnb不久.但我們的房源此前已有在各大網站售賣.
精緻典雅.溫馨裝潢.乾淨舒適的房間讓您在喧囂的城市中放慢腳步.恣意享受屬於自己的城市空間.
位於著名的弥敦道贯穿其中,这里是香港人气最旺盛的地区之一,潮流时尚.传统文化.市井风貌.小吃美食都汇集于此,全区繁华拥挤,不少商铺食肆通宵营业,故被称为是九龙的“不夜天”.
......歡迎您預訂我們的房間,愿我們能盡綿薄之力給您的旅途帶來最大的方便！

name: Premier Family Suite 2BR 8pax next to MTR TST K11
description:
Welcome to the unique and ultimate 2.0 Airbnb experience!

I am very happy to welcome you back now that this covid episode is over!

My brand new apartment is fully renovated in a luxurious, spacious and modern style.
700sqft (66sqm) net size of pure design and comfort to make you have a wonderful time in the great city of Hong Kong.

It's located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui district. It is 1min from K11 famous shopping mall, 5min from Avenue of Stars, 8min from China Ferry Terminal.
neighborhood_overview:
I love my district as it is in the heart of TSIM SHA TSUI.
There are 3 MTR (subway) exits around my building, literally less than 1min walk.
It is the most convenient as it is on Nathan Road, the famous and large street full of malls, fancy shops qnd tasty restaurants.
- you can easily go to shopping malls such as K11 (2min walk) or The One (5min walk).
- the Avenue of Stars is 7min walk.
- many restaurants and street food all around!
- KNUTSFORD TERRACE is just 5min by walk! Here you can enjoy many bars, exotic restaurants, clubs, pools..

I hope you will enjoy as much as I do!
host_about:
Hi everybody!

I am Lyna from Hong Kong. I am an architect and I spent the last few month renovating my apartment in a luxurious and comfortable way. I am sure you will love staying there!

Airbnb is a great way to meet people from all over the world, and it allows me to rent my spacious apartment when I am travelling.

Travelling is my hobby, so most of the time I'm out of town.
Hong Kong city is amazing, beautiful and full of energy, there is always plenty of things to do.

I hope you will like it!

Mongkok is located in the northern part of Kowloon Peninsula. The famous Nathan Road runs through it. It is one of the most popular areas in Hong Kong. Trendy, traditional culture, city well style, and snack cuisine are all gathered here. The whole area is busy and crowded. Many shops and restaurants are open all night. description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

大家好，我們是萬達青旅的訂單管理商，所有房源在平台上的可供預訂只需直接閃訂下單就行了，不需要詢問什麼是否有房、可否入住等問題。

請放心！萬達青旅24小時有工作人員值守，不會存在到店無人或到店無房的情況。在預訂後只需到達訂單上的地址入住就行了，即使沒有辦理到港的電訊漫遊套餐亦無妨，使用門外的掛牆電話直接聯絡職員就行了。

name: HS1/2 大床 地铁3分钟+稻香、翠华餐厅、肥姐小食+SASA、卓悦+朗豪坊+女人街
description: There's a separate bathroom! Convenient transportation, convenient to go anywhere: only 20 meters from Mongkok Metro Station Exit E1, 5 seconds walk downstairs is the airport A21 bus stop. There is a specialist who cleans the room every day, ensuring a clean and comfortable accommodation environment for each guest every day. There are more than hundreds of food stores, shops, and currency exchange shops. Located in the shopping center and convenient to reach the concert venue.For example, Sasa, Zhuo Xiao, Abundance ､ Broadway ､ Zhou Sheng Sheng ､ Zhou Dafu ､ Milan Station (specializing in famous branded handbags) ､ 120 meters from Lan Hao Fong, the largest shopping mall in Mong Kok. It is 7 minutes by subway from Tsim Sha Tsui Starlight Avenue ､ Harbor City, and can be reached directly by subway if you go to the Hongqi Stadium for a concert.
neighborhood_overview:
Attraction Introduction
Mong Kok is located in the northern part of the Kowloon peninsula, and the famous Nathan Road runs through it. This is one of the most popular areas in Hong Kong, where fashion, traditional culture, the style of market wells, and snacks and cuisine converge. The whole district is bustling and crowded, and many shops and restaurants are open all night, so it is known as the "all-night sky" of Kowloon.
Shopping Guide
Mong Kok may not have the big international brand stores like Tsim Sha Tsui, but it is a shopping destination for teenagers and young people.Shopping venues here have their own characteristics. The Langham Place, a large shopping mall, gathers a large number of trendy fashion and creative grocery stores; the girls' favorite cosmetics stores Sasa and Zhuoyue have many branches; the electronic digital stores such as Fengze, Suning, Baihui and others near Xiyang Cui South Street are one after another; the famous upstairs bookstores such as

name: B9-旺角站標準大床房/独立卫浴/有窗 Kammun Guest House
description:
The hotel is a licensed hotel in Hong Kong and opened in 1987.The hotel is located in the center of Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong. It is close to Xiyangcai Street (Electrical Appliances Street), Tongcai Street (Women's Street) and Laundry Street (Ball Street) in Mongkok. It is about 150 meters from Mongkok Metro Station and A21 Airport Bus. Other shopping and tourism hotspots, such as Langham Place, Xinhe Center, Mongkok Computer Center, Temple Street, etc. can also be reached within 5-15 minutes on foot.Go to Xingguang Avenue, Harbour City, Hongqiao Gymnasium, China-Hong Kong Pier, Hong Kong-Macao Pier, etc. There are also direct metro or buses.
Features a private bathroom, free WiFi, TV, towels, toiletries, hairdryer, adapter plugs, and a microwave and refrigerator in the lobby, as well as a public area.
All standard and triple rooms have windows, WiFi and a private bathroom.
neighborhood_overview:
The hotel is located in the center of Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong. It is close to Xiyangcai Street (Electrical Appliances Street), Tongcai Street (Women's Street) and Laundry Street (Ball Street) in Mongkok. It is about 150 meters from Mongkok Metro Station and A21 Airport Bus. Other shopping and tourism hotspots, such as Langham Place, Xinhe Center, Mongkok Computer Center, Temple Street, etc. can also be reached within 5-15 minutes on foot.Go to Xingguang Avenue, Harbour City, Hongqiao Gymnasium, China-Hong Kong Pier, Hong Kong-Macao Pier, etc. There are also direct metro or buses.

There are hundreds of shops and restaurants around the hotel, including Salsa, Excellence, Zhou Dafu, Zhou Shengsheng, Fengze, Broadway, Currency Exchange, Qihua Cake House, Shao Xiangyuan, Ji Cake House, Fat Sister Snacks and so on.Many restaurants are open 24 hours.

neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

name: HS4-4人双床房+旺角购物天堂+过境首选+地铁3分钟+香港人气最旺+美食中心
description:
Convenient transportation, easy to go anywhere: 100 meters from Mongkok subway station E1 exit, 5 seconds walk downstairs from the airport A21 ｡
｡
｡
Conveniently located in a shopping mall and easy access to concert venues.Such as Sasha, Zhuo Yue, Feng Ze, Broadway, Zhou Shengsheng, Zhou Dafu, Milan Station (specializing in brand-name handbags), Mongkok's largest shopping mall, Langham Place is only 120 meters away. Tsim Sha Tsui Walk of Fame, Harbour City is only 7 minutes by subway, and you can also go to the Hongyi Gymnasium to see concerts directly.
There is a separate bathroom!
neighborhood_overview:
Mong Kok is located in the northern part of the Kowloon peninsula, and the famous Nathan Road runs through it. It is one of the most popular areas in Hong Kong. It is a place where fashion, traditional culture, market style and snacks and cuisine converge. The district is bustling and crowded, and many shops and restaurants are open all night, so it is known as the "all-night sky" of Kowloon.
Shopping Guide
Mong Kok may not have the big international brand stores like Tsim Sha Tsui, but it is a shopping destination for teenagers and young people.Shopping venues here have their own characteristics. The Langham Place, a large shopping mall, gathers a large number of trendy fashion and creative grocery stores; the girls' favorite cosmetics stores Sasa and Zhuoyue have many branches; the electronic digital stores such as Fengze, Suning, Baihui and others near Xiyang Cui South Street are one after another; the famous upstairs bookstores such as Pastoral Bookshop and Preface Studio

name: Comfortable & Welcoming 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Just a short 35 mins journey from the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong Island, Sai Kung is the perfect location to base for your trip to our amazing city. Located near the waterfront our apartment is both comfortable and welcoming. All amenities are available within the apartment and there is so much more to see around Sai Kung including the famous seafood restaurants, ferries and country park.

Regular bus services will whisk you to the underground train which will take you around HK.

host_about: We are a family who love to travel and explore real life in different parts of our wonderful world, enjoying exciting locations, people and culture. We also love hiking, cooking, reading.

neighborhood_overview:
Wangkong is located in the northern part of Kowloon Peninsula. The famous Naidong Road runs through it. It is one of Hong Kong's most popular areas. It is known as Kowloon's “no night” because of its trendy fashion, traditional culture, city well style and snacks. The whole area is busy and crowded, and many shops and restaurants are open all night.
The shopping guide

neighborhood_overview:
Mongkok is located in the north of Kowloon Peninsula. The famous Nathan Road runs through it. It is one of the most popular areas in Hong Kong. Fashion, traditional culture, market style and snacks are all gathered here. The whole area is busy and crowded. Many shops and restaurants open all night. Therefore, it is called "No Night Day" in Kowloon.
Shopping Directory
Mongkok may not have as many international stores as Tsimshatsui, but it is a shopping mecca for young people. name: Spacious&Cosy 2BR TST MTR (700sqft)
description:
Designed by an Italian architect, this appartment was made to welcome families and large groups traveling together in the most comfortable manner.

Located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui in Mirador Mansion, with an uncommonly big surface in Hong Kong of 700 sqf, you also have a direct and easy access to the HK subway (MTR).

My apartment is surrounded by 4 MTR exists so you don't have to walk !
It is also 5min away from Kowloon High Speed Rail station!
neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is conveniently placed in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, almost everything worth visiting is just 5 minutes walk away!

First transportation is incredibly convenient since there are so many MTR exits all around my building so you have literally just 10 seconds to walk to get into my building!
exits D1 and D2 are both in Carnarvon Road side, exit D3 is in Bristol Avenue side in the famous K11 mall, this exit has a lift in B2 floor which you can take if you have luggage.
exit N5 is in Mody Road side.

The famous Avenue of Stars is at only 5 minutes walk. This is where you can take photos of the famous Bruce Lee statue and also all other famous Hong Kong actors!

This is also where you can see the symphony of lights at 8PM every night: all the famous Hong Kong side buildings illuminate and play light animations all together at 8PM.

Good news for the shopping lovers : my apartment is 5 minutes walk away from the harbour city lux
host_about:
Dear Airbnb friends,

It is my pleasure to meet you here, through this great community of travelling and sharing people from all over the world.

I am proud to say that I am a self made woman and that I succeeded in the businesses I've built for the last few years.

I am now able to freely enjoy my passions, mostly nature photography and travelling.

I have lived in Hong Kong for the last 10 years. I felt in love with this city, and I will probably spent many more years here.

Diversity, culture, food, nature, there is everything you may be looking for here.

So don't wait any longer and come to visit Hong Kong!

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#N@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview:
Check Inn HK’s place is located in Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong.
Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

by subway from downstairs Mong Kok station to Tsim Sha Tsui, 13 minutes to Central, 16 minutes to Causeway Bay.

host_about: Opened in May 2015, INN SQUARE is a TRENDY and COZY HOSTEL in Hong Kong, designed for the modern day global travelers. name: XY3-3人家庭亲子,楼下地铁站,出门就公园,星光大道.光彩维港
description: The room is located on Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong City. Each room is beautifully decorated and offers a local homestay experience. Located in the most central business district of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong, the transportation is extremely convenient to the most popular way of accommodation when traveling to Hong Kong. The room is equipped with LCD TV, hair dryer, Wi-Fi and other room facilities.There are many sightseeing and tourist attractions nearby, about 10 minutes walk to Hong Kong Cultural Center, Victoria Harbor, Celebrity Handprint Avenue of Stars, Tsim Sha Tsui Pier and Hong Kong Pier, etc. Shuttle to Kowloon, shopping, family visits, sightseeing are all very convenient
neighborhood_overview:
Tsim Sha Tsui is located at the southern tip of the Kowloon Peninsula, facing the Victoria Harbour and overlooking the sea from the middle of Hong Kong Island.Hong Kong's must-visit attractions include the Walk of Fame and Vivo Harbor. It is a shopping paradise lined with large malls, and is also a cultural center where science museums and art galleries meet. You can spend a fulfilling day here. Main attractions Tsim Sha Tsui has many famous attractions, such as Starlight Avenue, Victoria Harbor, Chongqing Forest viewpoint Chongqing Mansion, Star Festival and Kowloon Park. Shopping Heaven Tsim Sha Tsui is the most famous upscale business district in Kowloon. It has large shopping malls such as DFS, Harbor City and Sogo. There are also Hong Kong History Museum, Hong Kong Science Museum, Hong Kong Space Museum and Hong Kong Cultural Center. The facilities are advanced. It is a good choice for parent-child tourism.

description:
Our nostalgic style licensed guesthouse is located in Jordan.
5 minutes walk from Jordan MTR. (5分鐘佐敦港鐵站)
15 minutes walk from High Speed ​​Rail Station and Airport Express. (15分鐘高鐵站/機場快線)

In the disappearing old culture of Hong Kong, from the moment you arrive at the gate of our guesthouse, we will take you into the nostalgic and retro-style room furniture and decoration in Hong Kong.
(In the vanishing old culture of Hong Kong, from the moment you arrive at our gate, you will be taken into a hostel with nostalgic, vintage-style room furniture and decor.)
neighborhood_overview:
It only takes 5 minutes to walk from the guesthouse to the Temple Street. There are Hong Kong style food stalls in Temple Street, where you can experience the authentic flavor of Hong Kong.

There are also many different types of restaurants in the streets near the building, ranging from specialty Cafe with coffee and desserts, international cuisine to Hong Kong-style cuisine.

For shopping, you can walk 10-15 minutes to Elements/Harbour City.

(Walking from the hostel to the nearby Temple Street is also only 5 minutes, and there are Hong Kong-style large rows of stalls in Temple Street, where you can feel the authentic flavor of Hong Kong.)
There are also many different types of restaurants on several streets near the building, ranging from specialty cafe coffee desserts to international cuisine to Hong Kong-style cuisine.

host_about:
Hello, I'm Ling.
I love traveling and meeting people from all around the world.
If you have any questions about our room or traveling information, don't hesitate to ask me.
Don't be shy, let's talk.

本人愛好旅行，非常期待認識來自世界各地的您。
如對房間、周邊資訊和香港旅遊有任何問題，歡迎隨時聯絡我。
也隨時可以跟我聊天哦^~^

name: 99 Bonham - Standard Suite
description:
Located in Hong Kong’s dynamic Sheung Wan District, 99 Bonham provides exceptional access to prestigious business, shopping, dining and entertainment destinations.
99 Bonham is just a 3-minute walk from MTR Sheung Wan Station, while Central is a 20-minute walk away. Both Lan Kwai Fong and SoHo are 15 minutes' walk away. It takes an hour to reach Hong Kong International Airport from the property by taking Airport Express.
neighborhood_overview: At 99 Bonham you're in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts with convenient access to the city's most compelling attractions. The neighbourhood's winding streets feature a lively mix of traditional architecture, charming antique shops, contemporary art galleries, and chic restaurants.
host_about: Welcome to 99 Bonham, a sophisticated boutique hotel by the developer of The Putman and The Jervois. Located in Hong Kong’s dynamic Sheung Wan District, 99 Bonham provides exceptional access to Central’s prestigious business, shopping, dining and entertainment destinations. With architecture and interiors by the internationally renowned Italian design firm Antonio Citterio Patricia Viel and Partners, 99 Bonham offers chic yet serene accommodations ideal for business as well as leisure travellers. Each floor in the slender glass tower of 99 Bonham features three beautifully appointed guest suites with magnificent city views.

name: 旺角區經濟大床房Budget Double Rm@Mong Kok1702
description:
Licensed Guesthouse Queen Room - Located in downtown Mongkok, 3 minutes walk to Mongkok MRT Station Exit E1, about 1 minute walk to A21 Airport Bus Station, 5 minutes to Bo Shoes Street, Women's Street, Langham Place Mall. 3 MRT stops from Victoria Harbour, Tsim Sha Tsui
Bed Size (s): 1 large bed (s) (120cm * 185cm/4ft)
(房間不支持加床,適合1入住)
★Double room for 1-2 inside liciensed guest house
★Superb Location@Mong Kok City Centre: 1 Min walk to A21 Bus Stop to / from the airport, 3 Mins walk to Mong Kok MTR Station Exit E1, 5 mins walk to Ladies Market, Sneaker Street, Langham Place (Big Shopping Mall)
★This room features one 4ft(W) double bed, fit for 1 -2
neighborhood_overview:
Walk:
Mong Kok MRT Station Exit E1 takes 3 minutes to reach the accommodation, various gourmet snacks within 10 minutes, shopping mall Langham Place 5 minutes.
Transportation: 7 minutes by subway from
Mong Kok Station downstairs to Tsim Sha Tsui, 13 minutes from Central, 16 minutes from Causeway Bay.
Airport Arrivals: Take the A21 bus to Mong Kok Centre in 5 minutes on foot, or take the Airport Express to Hong Kong Station and transfer to Tsuen Wan Central to Mong Kok Station in 40 minutes.Return trips can be made from Mongkok Yalan Centre by taking the A21 back to the airport, or the metro back to the original route.The N21 night bus service is available to the airport 24 hours a day.
Take the East Rail Line from Mongkok East Station to Luohu and Futian Port in 38 minutes, and cross-border direct buses to various cities in Guangdong.

name: Flat 6 - Family & Pet friendly, in Pui O Lantau.
description:
Looking for a place to stay during your Lantau adventure? Look no further! Only a short journey from the city, this family and pet friendly retreat makes an ideal home, just 10 minutes walking to the beach for you & your friends and family.

Stay with us and receive a 1 hr FREE rentals at TIG Beachclub!
neighborhood_overview:
South Lantau is an incredible Oasis in Asia's city that never sleeps. Embrace the natural landscapes and be amazed by the tranquility only a half hour away from the buzzing Central District.
The famous Big Buddha is also located on South Lantau and can be reached from Pui O via bus, or (for those of you who enjoy breaking a sweat) a hiking trail.

name: 世外桃源，陽光與海灘。 A Hidden Gem in HK. Beach and Sunshine
description: This house is on the second floor of Bai La Village House. 700 sq. ft.
neighborhood_overview: Located in Bai La Village, close to Dong Xiao and Cotton Cave.
host_about:
實在太喜歡白腊灣，寧靜的鄉村，大自然的鬼斧神刀，很想與你分享這里簡單的生活。陽光、沙灘、牛糞味。
I have loved Pak Lap since I was young, a place that is far from the city, with the stunning scenery and calmness. It has everything that nature has to offer, the sunshine, the beach and definitely the numerous amazing hikes to see the best sunrise at 5am. A true hidden gem that no one can resist.

name: Executive Premier Suite 2BR 8pax MTR TST K11
description:
Dear Airbnb guests,


I am pleased to welcome you to my brand new apartment. As a designer and architect, I did my best to renovate it in the most cosy, spacious and convenient way for you. 700sqft of luxurious and comfy space will be yours.

Located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui district, it is right in front of MTR station (no need to walk!) and next to several shopping malls such as K11, 5min walk from Avenue of Stars, 8min from Harbour City
neighborhood_overview:
I love my district as it is in the heart of TSIM SHA TSUI, the best place to discover and enjoy Hong Kong as a local.
There are 3 MTR (subway) exits around my building, literally less than 1min walk.
It is the most convenient place as it is on Nathan Road, the famous and large street full of malls, fancy shops and tasty restaurants.
You can easily go to shopping malls such as K11 (2min walk) or The One (5min walk).
Harbour City is around 5min walk.
The Avenue of Stars is 7min walk.
Many restaurants and street food all around!
KNUTSFORD TERRACE is just 5min by walk! There you can enjoy many bars, exotic restaurants, clubs, pools..

I hope you will enjoy as much as I do!

Stylish brand new fully furnished and serviced Studio.

Lots of common space and it is perfect home for Work From Home professionals.

Located in the heart of western area on Hong Kong island with walking distance for all the scenic spots and offices.
neighborhood_overview: The prime location on 123 Queen’s Road West, Sai Ying Pun is a charming neighbourhood boasting a kaleidoscope of tradition, culture and modernity. Just a few steps in any direction are some of the best restaurants in Hong Kong, as well as numerous cafes and galleries. Sai Ying Pun MTR station is one minute away by foot; the nightlife and vibrant dining options of Soho, Lan Kwai Fong are a mere 15-minute walk away. If you need to get to IFC or the Central Ferry Pier, they’re just 20mins away by walking.

APARTMENT

neighborhood_overview: Only 2 MTR stops away from Central station, Sai Ying Pun neighbourhood today offers a similar kind of convenience to Sheung Wan district for those working in CBD. As one of Hong Kong's oldest neighbourhoods, the recent arrival of the MTR and Centre Street escalators, much like the Central-Mid-Levels escalators, have breathed new life into the area in the past few years. This, together with the affordable rental rates make Sai Ying Pun an increasing popular neighbourhood to live in for locals and expats alike.

name: Lovely 3-BR flat in Happy Valley
description:
This is a large flat of 700sq feet ideally located in Happy Valley, in the heart of Hong Kong island. The 3-BRs are equipped with a comfortable Queen bed, large wardrobe, large windows. airconditioned. Free wifi, and a washing machine.
2 supermarkets, organic market, public library and lots of restaurants are available at you door step. seconds away from the tram terminus and bus/minivan transportation, 10-15min walk to CWB&Wanchai.
Traditional “tonglau building”, walk up to second floor.
host_about:
Hi,
I am a superhost on airbnb for a more than 8 years now and I always enjoyed hosting people from all over the world. I have traveled to many places in Europe, America and Asia and have had the opportunity to stay in quite a few of them as a Airbnb guest myself.
The location of my flat(s) and rooms are always great, and I have a few for you to select from depending on your needs and budget. I look forward to hosting your next stay!

name: Maison surplombant la colline avec jacuzzi
description:
Perched on an ocean hill on a rock in the heart of the island of Cheung Chau, you'll enjoy 180-degree views that will allow you on warm days to enjoy the sunsets and admire the canvases at night. The house is designed as a setting of comfort.
Depending on your wish, you can enjoy the tranquility of the place and you soak up the hectic life of the fishing village.
This paradise is accessible after a 10 to 15 minute walk to climb the hill.
neighborhood_overview: Calm and peaceful neighborhood overlooking the island
host_about:
Bonjour,
Je suis ravi de partager avec vous ma maison.
J'espère que vous aimerez profiter des couchers de soleil depuis le jaccuzi et de la vue sur l'île de Cheung Chau. 
A très bientôt,
Jacques

name: Blueground | Mid Levels, security, nr escalator
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this bright Mid-Levels Central furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room with great high floor views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Hong Kong has to offer! (ID #HKG25)
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is in Mid-Levels Central, an upscale area rich in sports facilities and outdoor activities, like a scenic jogging trail. The area is served by buses, trams, & near the MTR.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Blueground | Mid-Levels, pool & gym, nr escalator
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this comfortable Mid-Levels West furnished three bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and roomy living room with great high floor views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Hong Kong has to offer! (ID #HKG50)
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is in Mid-Levels West, an upscale area with better air quality near Lung Fu Shan Country Park and scenic hikes. The area is served by buses, trams, & near the MTR.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Hi，我是Selena來自HK！旅行、美食、電影、音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴。每到一座陌生的城市，走街串巷，逛逛當地的菜市場，鉆鉆當地的小巷子，吃吃路邊攤，逛逛自由市場，才能真正體驗當地人的生活，不虛此行！另外，去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩，會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫。我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友。Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會。我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的。當然啦，Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店，成長路上難免有不足之處，望多一份溝通少一份誤解，Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨！

我们溫馨的客房坐落在香港銅鑼灣市中心最繁華的地方軒尼詩道，步行數分鐘即可抵達時代廣場，SOGO,DFS,樓下就有百年情懷叮叮車，附近美食數不勝數...

我們有家庭旅館式客房（無廚房）和公寓客房（帶小型廚房）的房間可供您選擇，您可以根據自己的實際需求來選擇需要入住的客房類型。

期待您的光临！

name: 1 BR Flat in Central Hong Kong
description: Situated in a highly desired area of Central Hong Kong on Square Street just above Hollywood Road and next to the famous Man Mo Temple. This designer high floor 1 bedroom flat has an open city view, a fully equiped island kitchen and bathroom, ample storage space, wifi, cable tv and weekly cleaning included.  3 minutes walk from the famous SOHO/POHO bar and restaurant scene. Perfect for medium to long stay! Available on monthly/Yearly basis only (Min stay 28 days).
host_about: I am from France and have been living in Asia for the past 23years. I love sports, travel and good wine.
