name: Cosy, Soho, 1 bed apartment
description:
Bright and cosy, 1 bed apartment just 2 minute walk from vibrant Soho and Central Hong Kong.

The apartment is recently refurbished and furnished well, with ambient lighting features, new air conditioning units, large windows, cosy sofa, wifi, TV with Netflix, dining table, large comfy bed, black-out curtains, wardrobe space and all the kitchen appliances you’ll need.

Close to lots of public transport links, cafes, bars, restaurants, rooftops etc (happy to provide some recommendations!)
neighborhood_overview:
Tourists spots - Tai Kwun, M+ Museum (Kowloon)

Breakfast/coffee - Feather & Bone, Fineprint, Bakehouse (must try their egg tarts!)

Bars - Shady acres, Honky Tonks

Restaurants - La Vache, Uma Nota, Holy Eats

Clubs - Quality Goods Club

Rooftop bars - Faye, Popinjays, Terrible Baby (Kowloon)

Taxis - if you walk to the end of Woodlands Terrace, where it meets Castle Road, you should be able to flag a red taxi within a few minutes

MTR - Central MTR is 5-10 minute walk away

Shopping - Fashion Walk (Causeway Bay), IFC Mall, Elements (Kowloon)

Takeaways - I’d recommend downloading Deliveroo, there are some great options locally for all cuisines
host_about:
Hi!

My name is Sandy and I’m from Manchester UK, and I’ve lived in HK for 6 years now.

I spend as much time as possible travelling & sampling different cultures when we can. I’m a big animal lover and massive foodie :)

In my spare time I like to hike or run trails and I love a trip to the beach.

I like to think I’m very approachable, and would be happy to help make your trip as enjoyable as possible. So feel free to drop me a message!

Welcome to Muki Hostel!
Newly renovated in 2019 in Tsim Sha Tsui, Amgum Hostel offers unbeatable convenience and delightful, refreshing homestay in Hong Kong.
This room features a comfy double bed and a single bed with a private bathroom, individual door locking, air-conditioning, free wifi, hair dryer, water purifier and basic amenities like towels, shampoo, etc.Hot water for shower as well.There is also an in-person cleaning service.
[Space]
This boutique guest house is located on 3rd floor of a clean and safe building with elevator elevator access with 24 hours security guard.Located in Lacquer Ham Dao South, 1 min walk - Tsim Sha Tsui Subway Station (P3 exit), 5 min walk - Starlight Avenue/K11/Tsim Sha Tsui Pier for great convenience for travelers.All guest rooms equipped with private access card entrance, offering great privacy and free experience.
[Guest access]
Public area inside the room is equipped with a lounge area, multi-person sofa, microwave,

description: Our room has a formal license issued by the Hong Kong Government. host_about:
Hi, I'm Selena from HK! Travel, food, movies, music all my life bit by bit. I like to make friends from all over the world. Airbnb provides gave me a good platform and opportunity. Personally, I have some pretty good availability, I hope to provide more passenger Airbnb, and also hope that everyone stay with us here are very pleasant and comfortable. Of course, Selena's hotel is to make friends from all over the world for the purpose of affordable hotel, we have been trying to do better, but we still have shortcomings, I hope every guest a little more of a communication misunderstanding, Selena is looking forward to you and your friends!///


Hi，我是Selena來自HK！旅行、美食、電影、音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴。每到一座陌生的城市，走街串巷，逛逛當地的菜市場，鉆鉆當地的小巷子，吃吃路邊攤，逛逛自由市場，才能真正體驗當地人的生活，不虛此行！另外，去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩，會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫。我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友。Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會。我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的。當然啦，Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店，成長路上難免有不足之處，望多一份溝通少一份誤解，Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨！

name: Family size apartment in TST
description: Embark on the extraordinary 2.0 Airbnb journey. Unveil my lavish 650sqft haven, exquisitely renovated for modern opulence. Nestled in Tsim Sha Tsui's heart, relish 3 direct MTR exits. A mere 1min to iconic K11 mall, 5min to Avenue of Stars, and 8min to China Ferry Terminal. Elegance and convenience converge for your sublime Hong Kong escapade!
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome back, dear guests!

Get ready for an exceptional 2.0 Airbnb experience that's unlike any other.

Step into my newly renovated apartment, where modern luxury meets spacious design. With 700sqft (66sqm) of sheer comfort and style, your stay in the magnificent city of Hong Kong is bound to be unforgettable.

Situated in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, my building offers an unbeatable location with 3 direct MTR exits mere steps away. Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Nathan Road, a bustling street known for its luxurious stores and delightful dining options.

Indulge in shopping extravaganzas at K11, just a quick 1-minute walk away, or take a leisurely 5-minute stroll to the famous Avenue of Stars. Planning a getaway? The China Ferry Terminal is a convenient 8-minute journey from your doorstep.

As your host, I'm here to ensure your experience matches my own enthusiasm for this remarkable district. Welcome to a 2.0 Airbnb advent

Exactly few Steps from Yau Ma Tei A2 MTR,my place is extremely convenient with convenient stores, KFC, numerous restaurants all downstairs in the heart of Mongkok Yau Ma Tei. Hidden in one corner however, my place enjoys full Parkview with a sun filled living room.

Using MTR A2 at doorstep, you will immediate access:
Poly, City, Baptist Uni within 10min
Central and TST Hub within 10min
Causeway Bay Shopping 10min

Heart of Mongkok 5min walk

My place is on 1st Floor, you need to use stairs
neighborhood_overview:
You will reach Mongkok main center that is full of vibrant with mega shopping within few minutes of walk.

From my place, it is at most 5 minute walk to most mega shopping malls and flee markets including Lady street, Sneaker Street, Temple Street and Multiple Shopping malls in Mongkok.
host_about:
Returning from Australia back to this hometown where i was born,I originally lived in Hong Kong but later migrated overseas with my family.While i still enjoy the living in Oz,Hong Kong can also be comfortable if you plan your limited space.

Working in interior design,I try to make all this happen at my listing.While I certainly enjoyed HK when i returned,I certainly hope your trip will be enjoyable staying at my place.

neighborhood_overview:
Tsim Sha Tsui is a vibrant and bustling area located in the southern part of Kowloon Peninsula in Hong Kong. Take pleasure in exploring the nearby Kowloon park, an idyllic setting for a leisurely stroll or invigorating morning jog.

For leisure travelers, Tsim Sha Tsui offers a plethora of entertainment options. The area is home to numerous shopping malls, including the famous Harbour City, where visitors can find a wide variety of international and local brands. The bustling streets of Tsim Sha Tsui are also lined with boutique shops, street markets, and luxury boutiques, providing ample opportunities for shopping enthusiasts.

Culture and history enthusiasts will be delighted to explore the many museums and art galleries in Tsim Sha Tsui. The Hong Kong Museum of Art showcases an extensive collection of Chinese art, while the Hong Kong Cultural Centre hosts a variety of performances, including concerts, ballets, and theatrical productions.

Nature lovers

Within an affluent neighborhood, my place is a colonial housing upgraded to modern standards. Surrounded by restaurants where local HK people dine out with international and Asian cuisines at your door step. Sung Wong Toi MTR B3 is only 3min walk away.

neighborhood_overview:

Sung Wong Toi MTR exit B3 is only 3min walk away There are minibuses that take you directly to Mongkok and Prince Edward within 5min Kowloon City park is only 5 min walk away where you may stroll or exercise during your stay

neighborhood_overview:
The area surrounding 263 Hollywood Road, Sheung Wan in Hong Kong is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood that offers a mix of cultural, historical, and contemporary attractions.

For business travelers, the area is conveniently located near the Central Business District, making it easily accessible to offices and corporate centers. The neighborhood is also home to several co-working spaces and business centers, providing ample opportunities for networking and professional collaborations.

For leisure travelers, the area offers a plethora of attractions and activities. Hollywood Road itself is famous for its antique shops, art galleries, and trendy boutiques, making it a haven for art enthusiasts and shoppers. The nearby Man Mo Temple, one of Hong Kong's oldest temples, is a must-visit for those interested in history and culture.

neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is conveniently placed in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, almost everything worth visiting is just 5 minutes walk away!

First transportation is incredibly convenient since there are so many MTR exits all around my building so you have literally just 10 seconds to walk to get into my building!
exits D1 and D2 are both in Carnarvon Road side, exit D3 is in Bristol Avenue side in the famous K11 mall, this exit has a lift in B2 floor which you can take if you have luggage.
exit N5 is in Mody Road side.

The famous Avenue of Stars is at only 5 minutes walk. This is where you can take photos of the famous Bruce Lee statue and also all other famous Hong Kong actors!

This is also where you can see the symphony of lights at 8PM every night: all the famous Hong Kong side buildings illuminate and play light animations all together at 8PM.

neighborhood_overview:
Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) is a vibrant and bustling district in Hong Kong that offers a mix of cultural, shopping, dining, and entertainment experiences. Here are some of the best spots and aspects to explore in Tsim Sha Tsui:

Victoria Harbour: Tsim Sha Tsui offers stunning views of Victoria Harbour, especially during the evening when the Symphony of Lights show illuminates the skyline. The waterfront promenade is a great place for a leisurely stroll and to take in the iconic Hong Kong skyline.

Avenue of Stars: Modeled after the Hollywood Walk of Fame, the Avenue of Stars honors Hong Kong's film industry. Visitors can find handprints of famous celebrities, enjoy the view of the harbor, and catch the nightly light show.

Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade: Take a leisurely walk along the waterfront promenade for breathtaking views of the cityscape and the harbor. It's a popular spot for locals and tourists alike.

description: This downtown home is centrally located, so it's convenient to enjoy everything that's close to everything.The interior of the room is large and comfortable.It's really cheap in Hong Kong!
host_about: 我是个热情的海外中国人，记得我第一次出国，当时选择酒店住，服务生很格式，不愿意告诉我当地我需要的信息，我想完了！这样这次变得只能看街景，什么信息都获取不了。后来我选择爱彼迎，住在当地人家里，房东告诉我所有我想知道的资讯，比如从什么途径获取当地政府信息，从什么地方获取行业息，办什么事要找那个部门，哪些景点有美丽的故事，出门要怎么坐车或打车。哇靠！这些都是在网上找不到的资讯，住家让我有家的感觉，太好了！当时我就在想是不是很多来到到陌生世界的人是否都和我一样的需求？现在我家里几乎成了小小的委事机构，有人要来生孩子、有人要买房租房、有孩子要来留学的、有人需要采购安全食品及物资邮寄的，只要有时间我都会努力去办！

name: Stylish Boutique Hotel Room
description:
Welcome to our trendy boutique hotel, in the heart of Sheung Wan, one of Hong Kong's most happening neighborhoods. Our hotel seamlessly combines the old-world charm of the area with modern amenities, creating a unique and captivating atmosphere that truly represents the heartbeat of Hong Kong's urban culture.

Nestled amidst stylish cafes, trendy art galleries, hip restaurants, bustling street markets, and charming green streets, our hotel stands out as the ultimate accommodation choice.
neighborhood_overview:
Sheung Wan is a trendy and dynamic district that perfectly blends traditional Chinese culture with a modern twist. As you step out of our hotel, you'll find yourself surrounded by a myriad of hip cafes, trendy boutiques, and stylish art galleries. The streets are filled with a lively atmosphere, where you can immerse yourself in the local culture and witness the fusion of old and new.

Food enthusiasts will be delighted by the diverse culinary scene in Sheung Wan. From traditional dim sum restaurants to trendy fusion eateries, the neighborhood offers a wide range of dining options to satisfy every palate. Don't miss the chance to try local delicacies like pineapple buns, egg tarts, and mouthwatering street food stalls that line the streets.

name: 地铁站漂亮的卧室  元朗-1
description: You will have a great time at this cozy place.
host_about: 我是个热情的海外中国人，记得我第一次出国，当时选择酒店住，服务生很格式，不愿意告诉我当地我需要的信息，我想完了！这样这次变得只能看街景，什么信息都获取不了。后来我选择爱彼迎，住在当地人家里，房东告诉我所有我想知道的资讯，比如从什么途径获取当地政府信息，从什么地方获取行业息，办什么事要找那个部门，哪些景点有美丽的故事，出门要怎么坐车或打车。哇靠！这些都是在网上找不到的资讯，住家让我有家的感觉，太好了！当时我就在想是不是很多来到到陌生世界的人是否都和我一样的需求？现在我家里几乎成了小小的委事机构，有人要来生孩子、有人要买房租房、有孩子要来留学的、有人需要采购安全食品及物资邮寄的，只要有时间我都会努力去办！

name: (LM8) 1min to YMT MTR with  2 bedrooms
description:
Next to Yau Ma Tei MTR Station. Our apartment is located only few minutes walk from Mongkok shopping district with a large number of specialty restaurants, malls, drugstore, flower market etc. You can find all you need here.

Close to Temple Street, entertainment is different day and night. You may find fortune teller (feng shui) stalls, local food stalls, souvenir stalls, fruit and dessert shops all in this famous tourist spot to experience the night life of Hong Kong.
host_about: Hey there! I'm born in the '80s, and life has been quite the adventure. Imagine me with hiking boots laced up, ready to explore the winding trails of our beautiful city. But when I'm not chasing sunsets on the hills, I'm wielding a paintbrush like a wizard—colors dancing on canvas. But here's the best part: I'm all about warmth and politeness. Your comfort is my mission. So, welcome to our cozy Airbnb and make this stay unforgettable!

name: Apartment room
description: All our rooms have a separate toilet. Clean and comfortable accommodation is the selling point of our rooms! The hotel is located on Nathan Road in the heart of Mong Kok, with convenient transportation. It is only 100 meters away from Mong Kok MTR Station Exit E1, and 5 seconds walk downstairs to the airport A21 bus stop. Langham Place, Mong Kok's largest shopping mall, is just 100 metres away, with more than hundreds of snack bars, restaurants and shops nearby.
host_about:
Hi, everyone.
I'm Jean
Although I had just come airbnb soon. But our listings had already been sold on major websites.
A warm and cozy room allows you to slow down in the hustle and bustle of the city. Enjoy your own city space.
Located in the famous Nathan Road, which is one of the most prosperous areas in Hong Kong, the trend of fashion. Traditional culture. Market style. Snack food are gathered here, the region is crowded, many shops shop overnight business, so Is known as the "no night" of Kowloon.
... welcome you to book our room, we would like to do our best to your journey to bring the greatest convenience!


各位小夥伴們.大家好.
我是Jean.
雖然我剛來airbnb不久.但我們的房源此前已有在各大網站售賣.
精緻典雅.溫馨裝潢.乾淨舒適的房間讓您在喧囂的城市中放慢腳步.恣意享受屬於自己的城市空間.
位於著名的弥敦道贯穿其中,这里是香港人气最旺盛的地区之一,潮流时尚.传统文化.市井风貌.小吃美食都汇集于此,全区繁华拥挤,不少商铺食肆通宵营业,故被称为是九龙的“不夜天”.
......歡迎您預訂我們的房間,愿我們能盡綿薄之力給您的旅途帶來最大的方便！

name: 高级公寓 3个房2个厅1厨
description: There are three rooms in the house, the first room is the large room, the second room is the small room, the third room is a bunk bed.
host_about: 我是个热情的海外中国人，记得我第一次出国，当时选择酒店住，服务生很格式，不愿意告诉我当地我需要的信息，我想完了！这样这次变得只能看街景，什么信息都获取不了。后来我选择爱彼迎，住在当地人家里，房东告诉我所有我想知道的资讯，比如从什么途径获取当地政府信息，从什么地方获取行业息，办什么事要找那个部门，哪些景点有美丽的故事，出门要怎么坐车或打车。哇靠！这些都是在网上找不到的资讯，住家让我有家的感觉，太好了！当时我就在想是不是很多来到到陌生世界的人是否都和我一样的需求？现在我家里几乎成了小小的委事机构，有人要来生孩子、有人要买房租房、有孩子要来留学的、有人需要采购安全食品及物资邮寄的，只要有时间我都会努力去办！

description:
ENJOY BIG DISCOUNT!!! 15% OFF for 28 night stays onward

Our studio is only 5 min walk from Austin station (柯士甸站) and 7 min from Kowloon station. Eateries, shops and malls are within walking distance. This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.

- Double bed
- Fridge
- Hairdryer
- Free Wi-Fi
- Air conditioned
- Full private bathroom
- Cooking space and ventilation
- 24 hour security in the building
host_about: In our humble spaces, you'll find all the comforts of home, with a dash of whimsy and a sprinkle of personalized flair. description:
Welcome to my apartment, stylishly renovated and furnished.
Located on Tsim Sha Tsui Austin Road, near three MTR exits, Tsim Sha Tsui East MTR and Tsim Sha Tsui MTR and Jordan MTR Station, 6 minutes walk from MTR exit, very convenient location!

Nearby The one mall, Miramar mall, Nosevodai, Avenue of Stars, By the Victoria Sea, K11 Musea, K11 Art Mall, Harbour City, Star Wheel, Science Museum, Space Museum
There is a 7-11, Wellcome Supermarket, Don Don Donki.Great price, the best option for lodging!

Please note that check-in time is 15:00; Departure time is 11:00; If you need early or delay, please communicate with the owner to get the corresponding fee;
There are 2 1.2m double beds and a 1.2m sofa bed in the house!

Add money after 6 guests on the property, please enter the correct number of guests.
Please remove shoes in the house and take care of the cleaning space!

We you enjoy your stay

Located on Austin Road, Tsim Sha Tsui with Hong Kong food and street side snacks nearby

K11 Art Mall, K11 Musea, Avenue of Stars, Hong Kong Planetarium, Museum, Harbour City, Sky Star Wheel, and much more

host_about:
Hi, I'm Selena from HK! Travel, food, movies, music all my life bit by bit. I like to make friends from all over the world. Airbnb provides gave me a good platform and opportunity. Personally, I have some pretty good availability, I hope to provide more passenger Airbnb, and also hope that everyone stay with us here are very pleasant and comfortable. Of course, Selena's hotel is to make friends from all over the world for the purpose of affordable hotel, we have been trying to do better, but we still have shortcomings, I hope every guest a little more of a communication misunderstanding, Selena is looking forward to you and your friends!///


Hi，我是Selena來自HK！旅行、美食、電影、音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴。每到一座陌生的城市，走街串巷，逛逛當地的菜市場，鉆鉆當地的小巷子，吃吃路邊攤，逛逛自由市場，才能真正體驗當地人的生活，不虛此行！另外，去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩，會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫。我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友。Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會。我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的。當然啦，Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店，成長路上難免有不足之處，望多一份溝通少一份誤解，Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨！
